SELECT DAT.PJ_KEY AS PJ_KEY , DAT.SALES_KEY AS SALES_KEY , DAT.REG_DT AS REG_DT , DAT.PJ_NM AS PJ_NM , DAT.AC_KEY AS AC_KEY , DAT.AC_NM AS AC_NM , DAT.BILL_DATE AS BILL_DATE , DAT.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , DAT.EMP_NM AS EMP_NM , DAT.BILL_STATE AS BILL_STATE
, DAT.SALES_TURN_AMOUNT AS SALES_TURN_AMOUNT , DAT.SALES_AMOUNT AS SALES_AMOUNT , DAT.SALES_TAX AS SALES_TAX FROM ( SELECT PSD.SALES_CT_FK_KEY AS PJ_KEY , PSD.SALES_KEY AS SALES_KEY , PSD.REG_DT AS REG_DT /* 거래 일자*/ , PMT.PJ_NM AS PJ_NM /* 프로젝트명 */ , PMT.AC_KEY AS AC_KEY , CAT.AC_NM AS AC_NM /* 거래처명 */
, PSD.SALES_TURN_AMOUNT AS SALES_TURN_AMOUNT /* 금액 */ , PSD.SALES_TURN_AMOUNT AS SALES_AMOUNT ,FLOOR(PSD.SALES_TURN_AMOUNT/10) AS SALES_TAX , CASE WHEN PST.BILL_ISSUE_DT IS NOT NULL THEN PST.BILL_ISSUE_DT ELSE PSD.SALES_BILL_FC_DT END AS BILL_DATE /* 계산서 일정 */ , PSD.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY /* 담당자 */ , CET.EMP_NM AS EMP_NM /* 담당자 */ , PSD.SALES_BILL_FC_DT , PST.BILL_ISSUE_DT , CASE WHEN PST.BILL_ISSUE_DT IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS BILL_STATE /* 1 : 발행완료, 0 : 발행예정 */ FROM PJ_SALES_DETAIL_TB PSD JOIN PJ_MAIN_TB PMT ON PMT.PJ_KEY = PSD.SALES_CT_FK_KEY AND PMT.DELETE_YN = 'N' JOIN PJ_CONTRACT_TB PCT ON PCT.PJ_KEY = PMT.PJ_KEY AND PCT.DELETE_YN = 'N' JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CAT ON CAT.AC_KEY = PMT.AC_KEY JOIN CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB CET ON CET.EMP_KEY = PSD.REG_EMP_KEY LEFT JOIN PJ_SD_BILLING_OP_TB PSB ON PSB.BILL_FK_PJ_KEY = PSD.SALES_CT_FK_KEY AND PSB.BILL_TURN_NO = PSD.SALES_TURN AND PSB.DELETE_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN PJ_SD_BILLING_TB PST ON PSB.BILL_NO = PST.BILL_NO AND PSB.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND PST.DELETE_YN = 'N' WHERE PSD.DELETE_YN = 'N' /* AND PSD.SALES_CT_FK_KEY = 'PJ210065' */ AND PSD.SALES_BILL_FC_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchFromDt}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{searchToDt}, '-', '')
AND CAT.AC_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{searchAcNm}, '%'))
AND PMT.PJ_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{searchPjNm}, '%'))
) DAT ORDER BY DAT.BILL_DATE ASC

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(DAT.SALES_TURN_AMOUNT), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT PSD.SALES_TURN_AMOUNT AS SALES_TURN_AMOUNT /* 금액 */ FROM PJ_SALES_DETAIL_TB PSD JOIN PJ_MAIN_TB PMT ON PMT.PJ_KEY = PSD.SALES_CT_FK_KEY AND PMT.DELETE_YN = 'N' JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CAT ON CAT.AC_KEY = PMT.AC_KEY JOIN PJ_CONTRACT_TB PCT ON PCT.PJ_KEY = PMT.PJ_KEY AND PCT.DELETE_YN = 'N' WHERE PSD.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND PSD.SALES_BILL_FC_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchFromDt}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{searchToDt}, '-', '')
AND CAT.AC_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{searchAcNm}, '%'))
AND PMT.PJ_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{searchPjNm}, '%'))
) DAT

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(DAT.SALES_TAX), 0) AS TOTAL_TAX FROM ( SELECT FLOOR(PSD.SALES_TURN_AMOUNT/10) AS SALES_TAX /* 세액 */ FROM PJ_SALES_DETAIL_TB PSD JOIN PJ_MAIN_TB PMT ON PMT.PJ_KEY = PSD.SALES_CT_FK_KEY AND PMT.DELETE_YN = 'N' JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CAT ON CAT.AC_KEY = PMT.AC_KEY JOIN PJ_CONTRACT_TB PCT ON PCT.PJ_KEY = PMT.PJ_KEY AND PCT.DELETE_YN = 'N' WHERE PSD.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND PSD.SALES_BILL_FC_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchFromDt}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{searchToDt}, '-', '')
AND CAT.AC_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{searchAcNm}, '%'))
AND PMT.PJ_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{searchPjNm}, '%'))
) DAT
